text: mariyu kapatavisvasulu evaro telusukovataniki. Mariyu varito (kapata visvasulato): "Randi allah marganlo yud'dham ceyandi, leda kanisam mim'malni miru raksincukondi!" Ani annappudu varu: "Okavela maku yud'dham jarugutundani telisivunte, memu tappakunda mitopatu vacci undevaram." Ani javabiccaru. A roju varu visvasanikante avisvasaniki daggaraga unnaru. Mariyu varu tama hrdayalalo leni matalanu tama nollato palukutu unnaru. Mariyu varu dastunnadi allah ku baga telusu
